  3. להוכיח

    • asinα=bsinβ=csinγ\frac{a}{\sin{\alpha}}=\frac{b}{\sin{\beta}}=\frac{c}{\sin{\gamma}}sinαa​=sinβb​=sinγc​

    תשובה
    משפט הסינוסים (חישוב שטח המקבילית), כאשר γ{\gamma}γ היא הזווית בין הווקטורים:

    a⃗⊗b⃗=∣a⃗∣∣b⃗∣sinγ\vec{a}\otimes\vec{b} = |\vec{a}||\vec{b}|\sin{\gamma}a⃗⊗b⃗=∣a⃗∣∣b⃗∣sinγ

    שטח המקבילית זהה גם עבור שאר הוקטורים במשולש, מכיוון ששטח המשולש הוא למעשה שטח המקבילית חלקי 2, ושטח המשולש תמיד שווה לעצמו

    a⃗⊗b⃗2=absinγ2=bcsinα2=casinβ2\frac{\vec{a}\otimes\vec{b}}{2} = \frac{ab\sin{\gamma}}{2} = \frac{bc\sin{\alpha}}{2} = \frac{ca\sin{\beta}}{2}2a⃗⊗b⃗​=2absinγ​=2bcsinα​=2casinβ​
    absinγ2=bcsinα2=casinβ2\frac{ab\sin{\gamma}}{2} = \frac{bc\sin{\alpha}}{2} = \frac{ca\sin{\beta}}{2}2absinγ​=2bcsinα​=2casinβ​
    absinγ=bcsinα=casinβab\sin{\gamma} = bc\sin{\alpha} = ca\sin{\beta}absinγ=bcsinα=casinβ
    ⇓\Downarrow⇓
    absinγ=bcsinα⇒asinγ=csinα⇒asinα=csinγab\sin{\gamma} = bc\sin{\alpha} \Rightarrow a\sin{\gamma} = c\sin{\alpha}\Rightarrow \frac{a}{\sin{\alpha}} = \frac{c}{\sin{\gamma}}absinγ=bcsinα⇒asinγ=csinα⇒sinαa​=sinγc​
    absinγ=casinβ⇒bsinγ=csinβ⇒bsinβ=csinγab\sin{\gamma} = ca\sin{\beta} \Rightarrow b\sin{\gamma} = c\sin{\beta}\Rightarrow \frac{b}{\sin{\beta}} = \frac{c}{\sin{\gamma}}absinγ=casinβ⇒bsinγ=csinβ⇒sinβb​=sinγc​
    ⇓\Downarrow⇓
    asinα=bsinβ=csinγ\frac{a}{\sin{\alpha}}=\frac{b}{\sin{\beta}}=\frac{c}{\sin{\gamma}}sinαa​=sinβb​=sinγc​

  7. x(t)=5ϵ−γtcosωtx_{(t)} = 5\epsilon^{-\gamma t} \cos {\omega t}x(t)​=5ϵ−γtcosωt
    1.

    fx=xsiny⇒f˙x=x′siny+xcosy⋅y′ f_x = x\sin{y} \Rightarrow \dot{f}_x = x'\sin{y} + x\cos{y}\cdot y' fx​=xsiny⇒f˙​x​=x′siny+xcosy⋅y′
    fx=xcosy⇒f˙x=x′cosy−xsiny⋅y′ f_x = x\cos{y} \Rightarrow \dot{f}_x = x'\cos{y} - x\sin{y}\cdot y' fx​=xcosy⇒f˙​x​=x′cosy−xsiny⋅y′

    x(t)′=−5(γϵ−γtcosωt+ωϵ−γtsinωt) x'_{(t)} = -5 (\gamma\epsilon^{-\gamma t}\cos{\omega t}+\omega\epsilon^{-\gamma t} \sin{\omega t}) x(t)′​=−5(γϵ−γtcosωt+ωϵ−γtsinωt)

    x(t)′′=(−5γzcosωt−5ωzsinωt))′x''_{(t)} = (-5\gamma z\cos{\omega t}-5\omega z \sin{\omega t}))' x(t)′′​=(−5γzcosωt−5ωzsinωt))′
    x(t)′′=(−5γz′cosωt−(−5γωzsinωt))−(5ωz′sinωt+5ω2zcosωt)x''_{(t)} = (-5\gamma z'\cos{\omega t} - (-5\gamma\omega z\sin{\omega t}))-(5\omega z' \sin{\omega t} + 5\omega^2 z\cos{\omega t}) x(t)′′​=(−5γz′cosωt−(−5γωzsinωt))−(5ωz′sinωt+5ω2zcosωt)
    x(t)′′=5(−γz′cosωt+γωzsinωt−ωz′sinωt−ω2zcosωt)x''_{(t)} = 5(-\gamma z'\cos{\omega t}+\gamma\omega z\sin{\omega t}-\omega z' \sin{\omega t}-\omega^2 z\cos{\omega t}) x(t)′′​=5(−γz′cosωt+γωzsinωt−ωz′sinωt−ω2zcosωt)
    x(t)′′=5(−γ(−γ)zcosωt+γωzsinωt−ω(−γ)zsinωt−ω2zcosωt)x''_{(t)} = 5(-\gamma(-\gamma) z\cos{\omega t}+\gamma\omega z\sin{\omega t}-\omega(-\gamma)z \sin{\omega t}-\omega^2 z\cos{\omega t}) x(t)′′​=5(−γ(−γ)zcosωt+γωzsinωt−ω(−γ)zsinωt−ω2zcosωt)
    x(t)′′=5(γ2zcosωt+γωzsinωt+ωγzsinωt−ω2zcosωt)x''_{(t)} = 5(\gamma^2 z\cos{\omega t}+\gamma\omega z\sin{\omega t}+\omega\gamma z \sin{\omega t}-\omega^2 z\cos{\omega t}) x(t)′′​=5(γ2zcosωt+γωzsinωt+ωγzsinωt−ω2zcosωt)
    x(t)′′=5z(γ2cosωt+γωsinωt+ωγsinωt−ω2cosωt)x''_{(t)} = 5z(\gamma^2 \cos{\omega t}+\gamma\omega \sin{\omega t}+\omega\gamma\sin{\omega t}-\omega^2\cos{\omega t}) x(t)′′​=5z(γ2cosωt+γωsinωt+ωγsinωt−ω2cosωt)
    x(t)′′=5z((γ2−ω2)cosωt+(2γω)sinωt)x''_{(t)} = 5z((\gamma^2-\omega^2)\cos{\omega t}+(2\gamma\omega)\sin{\omega t}) x(t)′′​=5z((γ2−ω2)cosωt+(2γω)sinωt)
    x(t)′′=5ϵ−γt((γ2−ω2)cosωt+(2γω)sinωt)x''_{(t)} = 5\epsilon^{-\gamma t}((\gamma^2-\omega^2)\cos{\omega t}+(2\gamma\omega)\sin{\omega t}) x(t)′′​=5ϵ−γt((γ2−ω2)cosωt+(2γω)sinωt)

  8. r(t)=B(t+τ)−2ϵ−3cos(at3)r_{(t)} = B(t + \tau)^{-2}\epsilon^{-3}\cos{(at^3)}r(t)​=B(t+τ)−2ϵ−3cos(at3)

    1. כדי לאזן את t יש לשים לב לפעולה המתמטית שבין משתנים אלו לt, ולכן:
    [a]=t−3 [a] = t^{-3}[a]=t−3
    [τ]=t [\tau] = t[τ]=t
    1. לצורך נוחות: τ=c\tau = cτ=c, B=bB = bB=b
    r(t)′=(b(t+c)−2ϵ−3cos(at3))′r'_{(t)} = (b(t + c)^{-2}\epsilon^{-3}\cos{(at^3)})'r(t)′​=(b(t+c)−2ϵ−3cos(at3))′
    r(t)′=(b(t+c)−2ϵ−3)′cos(at3)−(b(t+c)−2ϵ−3)sin(at3)(at3)′r'_{(t)} = (b(t + c)^{-2}\epsilon^{-3})'\cos{(at^3)}-(b(t + c)^{-2}\epsilon^{-3})\sin{(at^3)}(at^3)'r(t)′​=(b(t+c)−2ϵ−3)′cos(at3)−(b(t+c)−2ϵ−3)sin(at3)(at3)′
    r(t)′=−2b(t+c)−3ϵ−3cos(at3)−(b(t+c)−2ϵ−3)sin(at3)3at2r'_{(t)} = -2b(t + c)^{-3}\epsilon^{-3}\cos{(at^3)}-(b(t + c)^{-2}\epsilon^{-3})\sin{(at^3)}3at^2r(t)′​=−2b(t+c)−3ϵ−3cos(at3)−(b(t+c)−2ϵ−3)sin(at3)3at2
    r(t)′=−bϵ−3(2(t+c)−3cos(at3)+2a2(t+c)−2sin(at3))=velocityr'_{(t)} = -b\epsilon^{-3}(2(t+c)^{-3}\cos{(at^3)}+2a^2(t+c)^{-2}\sin{(at^3)}) = velocityr(t)′​=−bϵ−3(2(t+c)−3cos(at3)+2a2(t+c)−2sin(at3))=velocity
    r(t)′′=−bϵ−3[2(t+c)−3cos(at3)+2a2(t+c)−2sin(at3)]′r''_{(t)} = -b\epsilon^{-3}[2(t+c)^{-3}\cos{(at^3)}+2a^2(t+c)^{-2}\sin{(at^3)}]'r(t)′′​=−bϵ−3[2(t+c)−3cos(at3)+2a2(t+c)−2sin(at3)]′
    r(t)′′=−bϵ−3[−6(t+c)−4cos(at3)−2(t+c)−33at2sin(at3)−4a2(t+c)−3sin(at3)+4a4(t+c)−2cos(at3)]r''_{(t)} =-b\epsilon^{-3}[ -6(t+c)^{-4}\cos{(at^3)} -2(t+c)^{-3}3at^2\sin{(at^3)} -4a^2(t+c)^{-3}\sin{(at^3)} +4a^4(t+c)^{-2}\cos{(at^3)} ] r(t)′′​=−bϵ−3[−6(t+c)−4cos(at3)−2(t+c)−33at2sin(at3)−4a2(t+c)−3sin(at3)+4a4(t+c)−2cos(at3)]
    r(t)′′=2bϵ−3[3(t+c)−4cos(at3)+(t+c)−33at2sin(at3)+2a2(t+c)−3sin(at3)−2a4(t+c)−2cos(at3)]r''_{(t)} =2b\epsilon^{-3}[ 3(t+c)^{-4}\cos{(at^3)} +(t+c)^{-3}3at^2\sin{(at^3)} +2a^2(t+c)^{-3}\sin{(at^3)} -2a^4(t+c)^{-2}\cos{(at^3)} ] r(t)′′​=2bϵ−3[3(t+c)−4cos(at3)+(t+c)−33at2sin(at3)+2a2(t+c)−3sin(at3)−2a4(t+c)−2cos(at3)]
    r(t)′′=2bϵ−3[(3(t+c)−4−2a4(t+c)−2)cos(at3)+((t+c)−33at2+2a2(t+c)−3)sin(at3)]r''_{(t)} =2b\epsilon^{-3}[ (3(t+c)^{-4}-2a^4(t+c)^{-2})\cos{(at^3)} +((t+c)^{-3}3at^2+2a^2(t+c)^{-3})\sin{(at^3)} ] r(t)′′​=2bϵ−3[(3(t+c)−4−2a4(t+c)−2)cos(at3)+((t+c)−33at2+2a2(t+c)−3)sin(at3)]
    r(t)′′=2bϵ−3[(t+c)−2(3(t+c)−2−2a4)cos(at3)+(t+c)−3a(3t2+2a)sin(at3)]=accelerationr''_{(t)} =2b\epsilon^{-3}[ (t+c)^{-2}(3(t+c)^{-2}-2a^4)\cos{(at^3)} +(t+c)^{-3}a(3t^2+2a)\sin{(at^3)} ] = acceleration r(t)′′​=2bϵ−3[(t+c)−2(3(t+c)−2−2a4)cos(at3)+(t+c)−3a(3t2+2a)sin(at3)]=acceleration
